text: The is an annual marathon sporting event for men and women over the classic distance of 42.195 kilometres which is held in mid February in Kyoto, Japan. The course starts at Nishikyogoku Athletic Stadium and pass through Kyoto Botanical Gardens and the right bank of Kamo river and finishes near Heian Jingu. It was one of the top ten most expensive of the world's biggest marathons by entry cost in 2015. An event with the same name was held from 1969 to 1982. ==Results== Key: {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !Edition !Date !Men's winner !Time (h:m:s) !Women's winner !Time (h:m:s) |- |1st |11 March 2012 |align=left| |2:26:21 |align=left| |2:48:47 |- |2nd |10 March 2013 |align=left| |2:20:30 |align=left| |2:49:06 |- |3rd |16 February 2014 |align=left| |2:25:18 |align=left| |2:49:10 |- |4th |15 February 2015 |align=left| |2:21:14 |align=left| |2:45:30 |- |5th |21 February 2016 |align=left| |2:17:54 |align=left| |2:50:41 |- |6th |19 February 2017 |align=left| |2:20:32 |align=left| |bgcolor=#A9F5A9|2:45:15 |- |7th |18 February 2018 |align=left| |2:23:44 |align=left| |2:51:57 |- |8th |17 February 2019 |align=left| |bgcolor=#A9F5A9|2:16:27 |align=left| |2:51:40 |- |9th |16 February 2020 |align=left| |2:21:48 |align=left| |2:45:25 |} ==Kyoto Marathon (1969–1982)== {| class="wikitable sortable" |+ Winners |- !
